text: Willis O'Brien (1886 â€“ November 8, 1962) was a special effects creator and director. He did the special effects for The Lost World (1925), King Kong (1933), and Mighty Joe Young (1949). He won the 1950 Academy Award for Special Effects for Mighty Joe Young.The 22nd Academy Awards (1950) ==References== Category:Academy Award winners Category:American filmmakers Category:1886 births Category:1963 deaths
title: Willis O'Brien
